attributes.action: Accept current & ongoing citizenship applications from current citizens of countries other than England if prior ancestors citizenship can be traced to citizenship records of Great Britain at anytime in the past.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Be it read to all in Parliment and after its proper course of approval by members signed and accepted into the national law for all to see read and accept as law all current citizens of countries throughout the world be allowed to petition British Governmental Office for permanant citizenship, based on that individuals past ancestors British citizenship at some in previous records maintained by the British Government for such historical review study an identification.Citizenship by Ancestors birth in Britain
